enum  hingx_URL

 Sends an HTTP Get request to the given URL.

 Executes a search query against the HingX resource database and returns the results.

Detailed Description

Defines the functions that comprise the HingX API.

Function Documentation

_hingx_get ( $  url  ) 

Sends an HTTP Get request to the given URL.

Parameters:
$url (string) the URL.
Returns:
(string) the response or false on failure.

Retrieves the HingX resource that has the given id and returns a JSON string representing the response.

Parameters:

Returns:
(string) the response or false on failure.

_hingx_search ( $  terms = '',
$  page = 1,
$  num = 100 
)

Executes a search query against the HingX resource database and returns a JSON string representing the response.

Parameters:
$terms (string) the search terms.
$page (integer) the page index.
$num (integer) the maximum number of search results per page.
Returns:
(string) the response or false on failure.

Retrieves the HingX resource that has the given id.

Parameters:

Returns:
(object) the resource or null on failure.

$  num = 100 
)

Executes a search query against the HingX resource database and returns the results.

Parameters:

$num (integer) the maximum number of search results.
Returns:
(string) the resource ids or null on failure.
